attributes.action: Let NHS staff park for FREE at their hospitals during the Corona Virus
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS staff need to be 100% focused on their job in hand, not searching round for loose change to pay for the parking.
attributes.background: Our fab NHS staff are working ridiculous hours during the next few months helping our nation fight Civid-19. The last thing our NHS staff should do is pay to park their car. We want the government to tell them that parking at the hospital for NHS staff is free for 6 months til this is sorted

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
